metadata.title: KOVO-KUKY | CNC Machining & Custom Manufacturing
metadata.description: Professional CNC machining, turning, milling, and metal cutting. Custom manufacturing from steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and brass. Quote within 48 hours.

hero.title: Precision CNC machining
hero.subtitle: We manufacture parts exactly to your drawings. On CNC lathes and mills, we process steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and brass — fast, reliably, and with hundredths-of-a-millimeter precision.
hero.cardCta: Send a drawing — get a quote within 48 hours
hero.socialProof: We work with companies from CZ, SK, DE, and AT

services.label: What we do
services.title: Complete CNC Machining
services.subtitle: From single pieces to series — we handle everything under one roof

turning.title: CNC Turning
turning.description: Precision turning on Doosan Lynx 220 and Goodway GLS CNC lathes with Fanuc control. Rotational parts from steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and brass with ±0.01 mm tolerance.

milling.title: CNC Milling
milling.description: 3-axis milling on XHS and Robodrill centers with Fanuc control. Manufacturing precision parts from drawings or 3D models, from prototypes to series.

cutting.title: Material Cutting
cutting.description: Precision cutting of bar stock and profiles on Bianco saws. Cuts to your dimensions with minimal waste.

external.title: External Services
external.description: Complete service including galvanizing, welding, and other surface treatments through verified partners. No extra hassle.

process.label: How it works
process.title: From inquiry to finished part
process.subtitle: Simple and transparent process — you know exactly what's happening with your order

step1.title: Send an inquiry
step1.description: Fill out the form and attach a drawing. PDF, DXF, or STEP is all you need.

step2.title: Get a quote
step2.description: Within 48 hours, we'll send you a price quote with delivery timeline.

step3.title: We manufacture
step3.description: After approval, we start production on our CNC machines.

step4.title: We deliver
step4.description: Finished parts are inspected and delivered on the agreed date.

precision.title: Hundredths mm precision

delivery.description: We meet agreed deadlines. When we say a date, it holds.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: A reliable partner for CNC machining
about.description: KOVO-KUKY is a Czech company specializing in CNC metal machining. We have a modern machine park with 8+ CNC machines and an experienced team that ensures precise manufacturing according to your requirements. We work with companies across Central Europe.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: We maintain strict tolerances and guarantee the quality of every manufactured part.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We meet agreed deadlines and communicate transparently.

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: We handle both single-piece and serial production, from prototypes to large series.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Modern machines and an experienced team guarantee top-quality workmanship.
